formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu diesem AGI-Befehl in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Usage: SET MUSIC ON <on|off> <class> Enables/Disables the music on hold generator. If <class> is not specified, then the default music on hold class will be used. Always returns 0.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -2,3 +2,4 @@ Enables/Disables the music on hold generator. If <class> is not specified, then the default music on hold class will be used. Always returns 0. + Runs Dead : No
